messages.content: Hello! I'm your AI Design Assistant. How can I help you with your architectural or interior design project today?

Hello there! ðŸ‘‹

I'm excited to help you think about designing your space! To get started and make sure I'm thinking along the right lines for you, could you tell me a little bit about the place you're working with? For example, is it a new plot of land, an existing house you want to renovate, or maybe an apartment? ðŸ˜Š
